messages.content: Welcome to the Adaptive Quizzing System, Frodo!
Strategy: Adaptive: Questions will be selected based on your performance and learning needs.

Which of the following is participates in Meneldil?

1. John
2. Plague of Gondor
3. Yavanna
4. Uttermost West

feedback.message: Hmm, not quite so, my friend. Even the wisest cannot see all ends.
feedback.explanation: The wisdom you seek is thus: Uttermost West
next_steps: Do not be disheartened. Even Aragorn son of Arathorn had much to learn before claiming his throne.
Perhaps revisit the ancient scrolls that speak of these fundamental truths.

messages.content:
Hmm, not quite so, my friend. Even the wisest cannot see all ends.
